title: There isn't a single adc in this game who's been nerfed more than Ezreal
body: And there's not a single adc with more skillshots than him. So please don't tell me Ezreal doesn't take skill, because he is almost 100% skillshot. And (this just in) skillshots can be dodged, so he has more counterplay than anyone else. Still can't dodge his ult? Just hide behind the minions (the tutorial for noobs explicitly tells you to STAY BEHIND YOUR MINIONS) and the damage is reduced. Ezreal has so much counterplay, and he needs so many different stats (armor, mana, cdr, health, etc) it's stupid. In fact, I can't think of a single stat he doesn't need. Ezreal's 'e' takes up WAY too much of his power budget.

I've been playing a bit of ezreal recently, and I gotta disagree. He's actually Hella easy. The hit box on his q is really forgiving, and w passes through minions so that's easy to hit too. The only part of his kit that really takes any brainpower is his e  (not dashing into a Darius axe, jumping so that you hit a champ and not a minion) and learning that he still can auto attack and doesn't have to q everything
